statement: To become a LegalShield associate, you typically need three customers and one business partner.
reason: The context mentions that to get fast start qualified, you need three customers and one business partner. However, it does not explicitly state that this is the requirement to become a LegalShield associate.

statement: One of those customers might become an associate.
reason: The context does not mention that one of the customers might become an associate. It focuses on getting fast start qualified and having customers and a business partner.

statement: This can increase your belief level as you achieve your first rank and get paid.
reason: The context does not mention anything about belief level or achieving ranks. It focuses on getting fast start qualified and earning bonuses.

statement: Gain access to as much information as fast as you can.
reason: The context mentions accessing information but does not specify the speed at which it should be done.

statement: There are several videos available that can guide you on how to launch your business, structure it, and answer any questions you may have.
reason: The context mentions videos that provide guidance on launching a business, structuring it, and answering questions. Therefore, it can be inferred that there are videos available for these purposes.

statement: Utilize three-way calls to get expert help in answering questions.
reason: The context suggests using three-way calls to get expert help in answering questions. Therefore, it can be inferred that utilizing three-way calls is recommended.

statement: This way, you can learn while your prospect gets the answers they need.
reason: The context mentions using three-way calls to learn while prospects get answers. Therefore, it can be inferred that this approach facilitates learning.

statement: Take advantage of the resources available in your back office for continuous learning.
reason: The context advises gaining information and education from resources in the back office for continuous learning. Therefore, it can be inferred that utilizing these resources is recommended for continuous learning.

statement: By gaining information and education, you can become more competent and confident in your role as a LegalShield associate.
reason: The context suggests that gaining information and education can lead to becoming more competent and confident. Therefore, it can be inferred that this process can enhance one's role as a LegalShield associate.
